headlines.headline: Fantasy basketball picks, DFS and betting tips for Sunday's NBA games
headlines.description: Jim McCormick breaks down Sunday's NBA games and offers his top fantasy streamers as well as his favorite bets and DFS plays.

headlines.headline: Washington takes on Houston, looks to break 4-game slide
headlines.description: Houston Rockets (37-22, third in the Western Conference) vs. Washington Wizards (16-43, 13th in the Eastern Conference)

headlines.headline: Pelicans' Zion Williamson 'tweaks' ankle in win over Jazz
headlines.description: Pelicans forward Zion Williamson "tweaked his ankle" and was forced to leave Saturday's win over the Jazz in the second quarter.

headlines.headline: Taylen Green recounts record-breaking combine performance
headlines.description: Arkansas' Taylen Green, a top-10 quarterback prospect, recounts his record-breaking NFL combine performance.

headlines.headline: 2026 NFL combine buzz: Intel on free agency, trades, QBs
headlines.description: What will the Vikings, Cardinals, Colts and Dolphins do at QB? Has the A.J. Brown and Maxx Crosby trade buzz quieted? Which free agents are getting interest?

headlines.headline: Patriots prioritize draft, developing their own players
headlines.description: New England isn't likely to make any big free agent moves other than trying to hang onto its own.

headlines.headline: Did the Jermaine Johnson trade show Jets' hand for No. 2 pick?
headlines.description: With the trade of Jermaine Johnson to the Titans, pass rusher looks like priority No. 1 for New York.

headlines.headline: Will the Browns make a big move at QB in NFL free agency?
headlines.description: As Cleveland scours the QB landscape, it heads into free agency with few options.

headlines.headline: MSU's Thompson clocks 4.26 40-yard dash
